medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports 48-72 hours of abdominal pain characterized as dull in nature, with a sudden onset and intermittent duration with waves of pain. Associated symptoms include occasional nausea. The pain persisted, prompting a call to his gastroenterologist who referred him to the Emergency Department for further evaluation.
